Text: Thxs so much for this - missed it - Sky failed to record it and I can't get itvplayer here. If you hadn't gone to all the trouble of uploading it and taking out the dreaded adverts I would never have got to see it.  You're a star.

Hi ... TvTeam... Thx for the download... 
V-10 A-10... And taking the time to edit the ads out of the program...Great well done...

cheers
SG
